title: I Was Reincarnated In a Yandere Main Love Comedy Game And Suddenly a Dangerous Girl Became My Younger Sister - Novel Updates
genre: Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Absent Parents   Brother Complex   Doting Older Siblings   Incest   Male Protagonist   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Reincarnated in a Game World   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Sister Complex   Yandere
author: Myon   みょん
description:
One day, when I was looking at a single girl, I realized that this world was the world of a certain game.

In a world with a horror setting covered in a romantic comedy, the girl who became my little sister in that world was the one who would later kill me.>
